snippet: Comcast will announce a deal to acquire Time Warner Cable in an all-stock deal that will unite the first- and second-largest cable television operators in the country, according to people briefed on the matter.
abstract: Comcast will announce a deal to acquire Time Warner Cable in an all-stock deal that will unite the first- and second-largest cable television operators in the country, according to people briefed on the matter.

headline.main: Comcast Deal Seeks to Unite 2 Cable Giants
headline.print_headline: Comcast Deal Seeks to Unite 2 Cable Giants
